meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Aaron Benor Andrea Palmiter Eric Vernon Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7500.

td.p: Aaron Benor, an online sales director from Rutherford, New Jersey
Andrea Palmiter, a strategic data analyst from Woodinville, Washington
Eric Vernon, a retired government relations specialist from Ottawa, Ontario, Canada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $26,800)

tr.td: THE 50 STATES
SUPPORTING ACTRESS OSCAR WINNERS
IT HELPS TO REMEMBER
BOOKS & AUTHORS
BREAKFAST CEREALS
SPECIAL DOUBLE K

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Eric Vernon, congratulations. You are a 2-day champion. You have $50,400 for those two days. However, you have dropped our average to $28--no, $24,800.)
(Eric: I\'ll try to do better.)
(Alex: Do better on Monday.)
AaronWho is Richard Longsanks?
$0
EricWho is Shakespeare?
$11,800
AndreaWho is Cromwell?
$10,000
William Shakespeare')

He used the coat of arms granted to his father in 1596; it depicts a long-shafted weapon, a visual pun on the family name
Eric
Andrea
Aaron
2-day champion: $50,400
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
Eric
Andrea
Aaron
